examples: Schoenorchis endertii (J.J. Sm.) Christenson & J.J. Wood in Lindleyana, 5(2): 101 (1990).
source: IK. Date from E.A. Christenson, Phalaenopsis: a monograph (2001), page after title page.  Middle name from Peggy Alrich; Death year from Gustavo Romero (GH). Obit. in Orchid Rev., 119 (1294): 75 (2011).
